alert.note: Alert for Christian; Greene (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 07 at 8:28PM CDT until July 07 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL CHRISTIAN AND SOUTHEASTERN GREENE COUNTIES... At 828 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ozark, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Southeastern Springfield, Ozark, Fremont Hills, Galloway and Turners. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
